meanings.definition: The quality or state of being campy.
meanings.sent1: The campinesses of the movie made it entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit had a touch of campinesses that made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The playfully exaggerated campinesses of the costume party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The campinesses of the comedy show was like a burst of colorful confetti.
meanings.sent5: The campinesses of the performance left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The exaggerated, theatrical, or humorous style associated with camp.
meanings.sent1: The movie embraced campinesses with its over-the-top characters.
meanings.sent2: The drag queen's performance was full of campinesses and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The campinesses of the play added a fun and quirky element to the production.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of humor had a touch of campinesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The campinesses of the comedian's jokes had the audience roaring with laughter.
